name: Planet B
description:
In the year 21XX earth has been polluted so much that it no longer can support human life. Control humanity's last hope, a satellite with one mission; create a new planet from space debris.

Gameplay and Mechanics

  • Direct the satellite to create the largest planetoid you can via virtual joystick.
  • Collects & sticks space junk and other planets to grow your own but be careful not to bump into anything too large or your planet will break apart.

Game Objectives, Rewards and Powerups

  • Main Objective: Create a large planetesimal by absorbing masses smaller than you in the time allotted.

Credits
